pages.description:
You come across a strange metal shape in the ground. It hasn't moved in years. Perhaps there is something to be found.

Your stomach rumbles.

Submerging into the unknown you wander, discovering flaking walls whose metals are succumbing to rust.

You see dilapidated shelves, barren of treasures to squirell away.

You comb the subteranean dwelling. Unable to travel deeper into the structure due to unpenetrable shadows.

Tucked away, hidden by cobwebs, sits a dull silver box, a single red switch standing out from its dust covered skin.

"Ah ha!"

You realize the precious cargo you are holding.

"An alternator!"

It can be used to power electronics.
